sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const DetailScreen = () => { const params = useParams() const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ 'id': 1 }) console.log(params.id) const findUserById = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(userDetails => setUserDetails(userDetails)) useEffect(findUserById, []) // console.log(userDetails, "====="); const [active, setActive] = useState(true) return ( <>

    Basic Information

{userDetails.id}

{userDetails.name}

{userDetails.username}

{userDetails.email}

{userDetails.phone}

{userDetails.website}

{userDetails?.company?.name}

{userDetails?.address?.street}, {userDetails?.address?.suite}, {userDetails?.address?.city}

{userDetails?.address?.zipcode}

User Post
{/*expand to show search bar, create comment button and post new comments*/}
{/**/} {/* */} {/* */}
) } export default DetailScreen
